org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

Interface OccurrenceWriter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OccurrencePersistenceService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OccurrencePersistenceServiceImpl

    public interface OccurrenceWriter
    An interface to govern the updating and deleting of Occurrences. There is no insert because an Occurrence must always first exist as a Fragment, thereby having an assigned key. With the key any changes to the record are therefore updates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Occurrence delete(int occurrenceKey)
      Deletes the occurrence having the given key.
      void delete(List<Integer> occurrenceKeys)
      Deletes the occurrences given in the collection (in the order given).
      void update(org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Occurrence occurrence)
      Updates an existing occurrence.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Occurrence occurrence)
        Updates an existing occurrence. If the key field of the occurrence is null an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        occurrence - the occurrence to update
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the occurrence key is null
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • delete

        @Nullable
org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Occurrence delete(int occurrenceKey)
        Deletes the occurrence having the given key. Returns the deleted occurrence, or null if the occurrence was not found.
        Parameters:
        occurrenceKey - the key of the occurrence
        Returns:
        the deleted Occurrence, or null if it was not found
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • delete

        void delete(List<Integer> occurrenceKeys)
        Deletes the occurrences given in the collection (in the order given).
        Parameters:
        occurrenceKeys - the occurrence keys to delete
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails
